name: 2022 13th International Conference on Economics, Business and Management
content: Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference committees and accepted papers will be published in following journals: 1\. International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance (IJTEF), which will be indexed by ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EBSCO, etc. DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) 2\. Journal of Advanced Management Science (JOAMS), which will be indexed by Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, Engineering & Technology Digital Library and Electronic Journals Digital Library DOI: 10.18178/joams ISSN: 2168-0787
